data.text: @JuliusGoat @juliegoldberg Thank your kid for all the unvaccinated kids under 5 out there, including my niece.

@JuliusGoat I live a block from a maj. Black & Latino HS. There’s a Kroger across the street. If I’m there between 3 & 5, it’s crawling with teenagers getting after school snacks & hanging out. *All* of them wear masks, even though we haven’t had anything like a mask mandate since 2020.

@JuliusGoat I live next to a 2200 student high school in red KS. When school lets out, they stream from the building in every direction and I see none removing their masks. They even wear them walking home with their friends. So traumatizing 😏
@JuliusGoat Is group-doing anything withOUT a mandate even legal!!!?
@JuliusGoat Our mandate at schools in KC was lifted early last week and I still have 90% of kids in all my classes wearing them.

@JuliusGoat I’m an itinerant teacher who works in multiple schools w all grade levels. I’ve yet to hear any student complain about masks. It’s part of school life now, just like bringing your books to class, or moving when the bell rings.

@JuliusGoat I live in West Michigan. Since my kids are all grown and I can't verify that you're NOT referring to the school district I live in, I'm going to assume we're neighbors and that your kid and their classmates represent a more hopeful future - beginning with my local community.
